mean_cn: adj.草书的；草书体的；  n.草书原稿
mean_en: a type of handwriting in which all the letters in a word are connected to each other
sentence: We use computers so much that cursive handwriting isn\u0027t as common as it used to be.
sentence_trans: 我们使用电脑太过频繁以至于潦草的笔迹不像过去那么常见了。
word_etyma: curs跑，发生 + ive具有...性质的 → 象跑 → 样写 → 草写的
